sentences.en: Finches start to molt at around twelve weeks of age.
sentences.cn: 燕雀大约在12个星期大小的时候开始换羽毛。

sentences.en: He said emperor penguins can spend months at a time in the ocean, coming ashore only to molt or rest, but did not know what might have caused this particular one to become disoriented.
sentences.cn: 他说帝企鹅可以一次性在海里带上数月，上岸只是为了脱毛换羽和休息。 但不知道是什么造成了这只特别的企鹅变得分不清楚方向。

sentences.en: Like all crustaceans, krill must molt in order to grow.
sentences.cn: 象所有甲壳纲, 磷虾必须蜕变为了增长.

sentences.en: Like other penguins, it undergoes an annual molt, replacing all its feathers in a few weeks.
sentences.cn: 和其他企鹅一样，它也经历一年一次的脱毛，在几周时间里替换掉所有的羽毛。

sentences.en: Molt - inhibiting hormone ( MIH ) is a member of CHH ( crustacean hyperglycemic hormone ) family.
sentences.cn: 蜕皮抑制激素 ( molt -inhibitinghormone, MIH ) 属甲壳动物高血糖激素 ( crustaceanhyperglycemichormone,CHH ) 家族.

sentences.en: Small birds molt once or twice a year, and they replace their 9 or 10 primary flight feathers a few at a time over the course of a few weeks.
sentences.cn: 形体小的鸟儿一年脱羽一到两次。 它们有9到10只主要用于飞行的羽毛，鸟儿们一次更换几只，在几周的时间内它们就可以完成更换。

sentences.en: They molt carapaces , I molt old body.
sentences.cn: 他们换壳, 我换身体.

sentences.en: This veterinary product is very effective in preventing animal molt.
sentences.cn: 这种兽药对于防治兽类掉毛很有效.
